_sText:
Bomb defusal
40 players
3 bombsites

Probably last map of my reconstruction project. 
We call this top of hill "kopec" which means hill in czech. There is ancient Watchtower build 100 years ago. There is also pub next to this sight. Little lower is abandoned pool, which become dilapidated.

I tried to make strategic experiment - make 3 bombsites on relative open and small area. All three bombsites are connected by underground halls and rooms.

Unfortunately, CSS don't count with 3 bombsites, so C doesn't appear on minimap. Bombsite area covers entire building so you can put bomb even on roof, if you can get there...

I learned soundscapes for this map, so atmosphere is quite better than in my recent maps. Next big step is my own models used in map. You may notice new cars. Those are part of my custom models pack. 

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
